mapper.select: select q.id, q.title, q.standard from question q left join library_question_link lq on q.id = lq.question_id and q.is_deleted = 0 and lq.is_deleted = 0 left join question_library l on l.id = lq.lib_id and l.is_deleted = 0 and lq.is_deleted = 0 where l.id = #{libId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and q.id is not null
